title: Is that a sleeping bag? 5 odd and iconic looks from Billie Eilish
text:
Teen superstar looks ready for a power nap in her new video with Elle magazine

Been on YouTube lately?

If so, you’re probably aware of Elle’s Song Association series, which has basically become the new Carpool Karaoke.

And yesterday, we finally got one with pop star Billie Eilish.

The world’s most popular teen is given random words and has to respond within 10 seconds by singing a song that features the word.

But it’s hard to focus on her melodies when her outfit — which looks sort of like a sleeping bag — is so gosh darn distracting.

The outfit falls right in line with Eilish’s oversized fashion philosophy, which she described in her Calvin Klein campaign from earlier this year.

“I never want the world to know everything about me. I mean, that’s why I wear big, baggy clothes. Nobody can have an opinion, because they haven’t seen what’s underneath,” Eilish has said. (Calvin Klein/YouTube)

And with this look being perhaps her biggest and baggiest yet, we can’t help but wonder — what’s next? A tent?

Until we get our full campsite fantasy, here’s a look back at some of the most odd and iconic looks Billie has turned to date.

Ikea bag realness

(Vivian Killilea/Getty Images)

In May 2017, Eilish showed up to the Billboard Music Awards in a shawl that looked like an Ikea shopping bag. Question is, how much would she ring in at at checkout? Until we find out, we’ll settle for some Swedish meatballs.

Sugar, spice and every bling nice

(Ari Perilstein/Getty Images)

Eilish sported yet another “puffy” look (get it?) to the ASCAP Pop Music Awards in May 2019, inspired by the hit superhero cartoon Powerpuff Girls from the early 2000s. Probably not the best thing to wear when fighting crime, though.

Painting accident?

(Joe Scarnici/Getty Images)

At Spotify’s Billie Eilish Experience pop-up earlier this year, Eilish made a splash by rocking a bucket hat and outfit that looked like she walked under a ladder at the wrong time, paint-bucket-on-head style. Thankfully, this accident is a happy one.

You’re one sick puppy

(Leon Neal/Getty Images)

This outfit would definitely make for one scary-looking veterinarian. Thankfully, Eilish is too busy with her music career to look after sneezing puppies. The garment was unveiled in June as part of Stella McCartney’s new collection, inspired by The Beatles.
description: Billie Eilish’s sleeping bag couture from her Elle song association video and other odd looks from the teen superstar.
